website_summaries.verdict: Traditional turkey call with consistent, realistic sound.
pros: solid mahogany and walnut construction with built-in lid stop for correct use every time
Produces realistic, rich turkey yelps, clucks, and purrs for beginners and experienced hunters alike
cons: Requires the use of both hands

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a guy that has never used a turkey ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to use this call over the weekend. Worked great for a guy that has never used a turkey call before. Only downside was that it is very load and if your Tom is coming in hot you want in to quiet down a little? That's just my opinion. But this is a great call. You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jacob E.

customer_reviews.title: The Gold Standard
customer_reviews.text: The Gold Standard in turkey calls. Gave it as a gift to my daughter's 12 year old friend. She was able to pick up the basic calls in about 2min. Absolutely the best way to introduce someone to turkey calling AND an ideal call for even the most advanced callers.
customer_reviews.author: MN Outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: We got a big Tom gobbler just a day or two after upgrading to this call. It’s easy enough to use that my 4yo was making realistic hen sounds with it with just a few pointers!
customer_reviews.author: AK Smith

customer_reviews.title: I went on Amazon and found it for him and he's so happy!! Thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this turkey caller for my husband!! My husband loves and believe in this box, he had one over 20+ years ago and the box cracked cause it was so old and he thought he would never find another! I went on Amazon and found it for him and he's so happy!! Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel M.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Chin Music for ThunderChickens!
customer_reviews.text: My grandpa had this box call when I was a kid. My nephew has it and I have tried 3 box calls but none sound as good as this one. I consider it the best box call ever made. I ordered one and received it Monday night. Tuesday morning I made 6 yelps with and this big boy came running! They can't handle it!
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Nothing can beat a Lynch box
customer_reviews.text: My dad's Lynch still sounds the best, even though it is 40 years old, but this Lynch is a close 2nd. You really can't go wrong with a Lynch box. Especially if you are beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to get great sounds
customer_reviews.text: While I am fairly new at turkey hunting, I borrowed one of these from my brother last year, which I used it to call in and harvest my first Gobbler. I just received my order and was very happy with it. The call is easy to get great sounds out of and has great range from light purrs to loud yelps. I would recommend this call to anyone getting started or the seasoned veteran. I do wish it had an instructional video; however, youtube has plenty of "how to" videos posted. This will not be the last Lynch Box Call I purchase. I got my call before scheduled, which was during the christmas rush. Very Pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: Willie33

customer_reviews.title: Really nice call
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is my first Turkey call and it is easy to use and sounds great. I'm very happy that I bought this instead of a cheap one.
customer_reviews.author: blynch35

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great with the little ive been able to play with it. Season doesn't start here till the 27th so not to much longer and this call will be put to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eli S

customer_reviews.title: Got one!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this this season and had some gobbles the hole time great product o yeah and got it done as well it will always come on turkey hunts with me
customer_reviews.author: David Crane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Wish it came with a stick of chalk.
customer_reviews.author: BlueFalcon

customer_reviews.title: If you want to call in turkeys, get yourself a 101!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my trusty 101 for years and just ordered another in 2019. Best box call made! I have dropped my call (while running and gunning for turkeys) and actually had a bird respond to the noise when it hit the ground. My call selection for years has been a slate and a 101. Nothing else compares.
customer_reviews.author: Burgess

customer_reviews.title: It came with easy instructions. I would recommend this call to my ...
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a Lynch box call and the price was just right. It came with easy instructions. I would recommend this call to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: stanjo

customer_reviews.title: Sweet sounds
customer_reviews.text: This is one great sounding call! Hoping the turkeys feel the same way :) It seems to be very well made. I will update after turkey season in MN but right now I am very happy with the purchase. I have two other box calls and this one promises to be a favorite.
customer_reviews.author: fishcat9

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: The turkey season is a few weeks away. I read on many sites that this call had high ratings. The big bid stores do not carry this exact version or can be obtained on back order. No back order on Amazon. I may report back after the season ends this May 2014.
customer_reviews.author: FD Firefighter 121

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first year hunting turkey. After 2 failed outings with a pot call, I used this in the woods on a gobbling Tom. No decoys needed, walked right in
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The name says it all
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Called un several Goulds turkeys on first use in Mexico
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It gets and deserves 5 stars, if there was a way to give it 10 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: WildBill

customer_reviews.title: Best box call I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is best box call I have used. It is the bomb in bama
customer_reviews.author: Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Sounds authentic and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: turkeys responded well to the call. Sounds authentic and easy to use. Second day I had two nice gobblers called in within 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend getting one
customer_reviews.text: This box call is fool proof, trust me, I know the guy that uses it. Highly recommend getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Best box call on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is the top of the line box call. Tried and true. So easy to use that even a novice turkey hunter can get the hang of it in no time.
customer_reviews.author: M J Draper

customer_reviews.title: Lynch 101f Great box call
customer_reviews.text: This box call is great. Had a Lynch call as a teen and sounded good, this one is no different. Great buy for $41.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: I think it's one of the best turkey made I have had 4 Lynch Fool Proof ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it's one of the best turkey made I have had 4 Lynch Fool Proof Box Calls in the last and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: In great condition and sounds perfect Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounded great. Paddle broke second day along the grain where nail is.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Great turkey call!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think there is a better box call made! I is easy to use and has a sound and pitch that is as real as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Trampus A. McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: It helps from making bad call.
customer_reviews.text: Called a gobbler in with it. It helps from making bad call.
customer_reviews.author: Carl M. Baumgardner

customer_reviews.title: Great Call
customer_reviews.text: The first turkey call I was sent got broken during the shipping process. I submitted a request and they sent a replacement call and a shipping lable to return the broken one. The seller Midwest Marine used two day shipping so both of the calls came a lot quicker than expected. As for the Turkey call itself the Lynch Fool Proof is the most realistic sounding call available. Overall I was very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: scarter1021

customer_reviews.title: It's Fool Proof
customer_reviews.text: My dad has had a Lynch fool proof box call for over 20 years. He has called in a ton of birds for himself and other hunters. I decided to buy myself one and I'm not disappointed. My dad's is all mahogany and is one has a walnut lid and mahogany body. They sound slightly different but they both work perfect. I would consider a good box call a must for any serious turkey hunter, and this one fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: prepare for your teeth to ache
customer_reviews.text: i was told by a seasoned veteran to pick a box call that can do one thing. that one thing is to make my teeth hurt when i run the call. well? this one does that. right out of the box. i opened the box with the enthusiasm usually associated with kids on Christmas. right away, i ran thru a few of the LIES i expect to tell the birds. i could run it at varied volumes. done. i have several weeks to wait, and this one will be with me with my myriad of calls. going with a bow and pellet-gun this year.
customer_reviews.author: Minimus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best call. Magic. Killed many toms with this call. 8 grand slams.
customer_reviews.author: Toms, Bucks and Lunkers

product_meta.title: Lynch Fool Proof Turkey Box Call
feature_bullets: EASY TO USE: Easy to operate and highly successful, the Fool Proof name says it all
CONSISTENT: Designed with an offset pivoting lid and automatic lid stop to ensure perfect notes on every stroke
REALISTIC: This wood box turkey call is made of a solid straight-grain mahogany base and walnut lid to reproduce realistic hen yelps you won’t get from plastic
HUNTING LEGACY: Great turkey call for both beginners and experienced hunters, and a favorite for more than 75 years
MADE IN USA: Hand made in the USA and hand tuned to perfection

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars83 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
